name: Working Airi is slashing
description:
■ Overview
The undisputed strongest swordfighter in the guild, Airi, loses his sword due to bad luck and scandals.
Having lost her sword, she has no choice but to earn a part-time job that she is not accustomed to for fines and debt repayment.
The body and mind are used for the desire and conspiracy to wriggle in the entertainment district.

It is an RPG that is deceived by the malicious intent of many people, loses money, and is dyed with shame.
Through numerous H experiences, Airi, who is self-respecting and arrogant, endures shame, anger, loses sexual desire, sadness,
It reopens, grows, and depending on the branch, the spirit is eroded and falls.

■ Synopsis
In the Edel nation that introduced the "My Card System", the nation was banished due to inadequate law and insecurity.
"Wanderers" were appearing one after another.
Some wanderers were harming the general public, and a negative spiral was being created, including more wanderers.
Meanwhile, a swordfighter of justice who continues to genocide evil wanderers suddenly appears in Rusten Street, the largest entertainment district in the country.

Her name is Airi.
A narcissist who is stronger than you can imagine from her pretty appearance, is more arrogant than anyone else, and likes her most in the world.

However, at the same time as a certain incident triggered all the plots to move and the situation surrounding her changed drastically.
Airi herself will also change significantly.

■ System
In order to enjoy the H scenes and scenarios, this work always displays standing pictures.
The production of the novel game flavor that makes use of RPG elements has been strengthened with abundant changes in facial expressions.

The following are the features of this work.

There is no battle.
・ Airi will fight in the production and events, but there is no battle as a game.
-Therefore, elements such as dungeon capture and level up are eliminated, and you can easily see the H scene.

The main story is to earn and pay fines and debts as a part-time job.
・ In order to pay within the deadline, I will work hard at various places to work part-time (most of them are H).
・ The H scene will become more radical depending on the number of part-time jobs and the degree of lewdness.
・ If payment cannot be made within the deadline ...

A divergent story.
・ The ending of the story changes depending on Airi's actions.
・ There are 9 ENDs, and you can enjoy the world view and characters of this work more deeply by looking at each END.
The length after branching is not so long.

Overview of H scenes.
・ Total H scene: 90 or more. Sub window CG: 9 types. Standing picture with H CG: 16 types. (Both include sub characters.)
-Express the movement and climax at the time of insertion with a simple animation.
・ The main stage is H scenes, from shame to humiliation. There are also many one-off mini-events.

・ Recollection mode: Yes (H scene can be fully opened after clearing true END.)
・ H scene skip function once seen (You can play comfortably when aiming for multiple ENDs.)
-Message window clear function
・ Message skip function
・ Backlog function

・ Estimated play time: 10 hours to 15 hours (when collecting all END & all H scenes by yourself)

■ H scene example
The theme of the H scene of this work is shame.
There are also humiliations and gangbangs.

・ Part-time job in embarrassing costumes, sexual harassment and mischief from customers.
・ Hypnotized and humiliated for treatment of poor physical condition.
・ Surrounded by a plaza with many people, you will encounter a group molester.
・ I was caught by the military police and interrogated.
・ Embarrassing photos and videos will be sold without permission so that the city people can see them with strange eyes.

Chupa sound and Kuchu sound use materials such as [Mijinko material] and [Tiger Lily].
